text:
Herbert Feuerstein (15 June 1937 – 6 October 2020) was an Austrian-born German journalist and comedian.
Career.
He worked for and, from 1968, became editor of the German-language newspaper "New Yorker Staats-Zeitung".
From 1968, he was the editor of the German version of "Mad".
He also worked as the dub voice of Gilbert Huph in the German-language version of Pixar's "The Incredibles".
Personal life.
Feuerstein was born in Zell am See, Austria.
He became a German citizen in 1990. Feuerstein died in Erftstadt, Germany on 6 October 2020, aged 83.
